summary: The diff shows changes to Footer.tsx (Caffeine AI attribution removed), a file summary confirming Footer and Header changes, and project_state.json. REQ-1 (Footer) appears addressed. REQ-2 (Header) is claimed in the file summary but no actual Header.tsx diff is provided. REQ-3 (audit of all other components) is only partially evidenced — the file summary mentions no Caffeine AI in listed components, but no actual diffs for those files are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all references to 'Caffeine AI' from the Header component — including the name, any logo/icon, and any associated links.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff for frontend/src/components/Header.tsx is provided. The file summary claims no Caffeine AI references exist in the Header, but there is no code-level evidence of any change or audit in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit and remove all references to 'Caffeine AI' from every other page or section component across the entire frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: No diffs are provided for Home, HeroSection, ContactSection, ServicesGrid, DoctorProfile, TestimonialCarousel, or any admin pages. The file summary descriptions mention these components but do not confirm Caffeine AI was found and removed. Without code diffs, it cannot be verified that a full audit was performed and all occurrences removed.
